desc: Custom Illusions LLC is dedicated to excellent customer service and a superb shopping experience for all customers. We specialize in creating crochet headband wigs (braids and Senegalese Twists). We are excited to soon add Passion Twists to our styles. Finally, custom and/or personalized tumblers will also be added.

layout.text: Please allow 5 to 7 business days (excluding weekends and holidays) for packages to ship. Thank you.
